title: Dote Dainty Snowflake Pendant Genuine .925 Sterling Silver Necklace 16-18 Adjustable Chain
features: Dote on yourself with the Dote Jewelry premium sterling silver snowflake pendant necklace
Classic and eye-catching, this pendant is striking with its simple elegance and solid, durable design
Made of solid .925 sterling silver, this beautiful and fashionable everyday statement piece gives the wearer flexibility for both casual or formal occasions
Pendant is perfectly sized at 16.6mm H (.65") x 14.7mm W (.58") and stamped .925 for authenticity
High quality 16"-18" adjustable sterling silver link chain with lobster clasp closure
description: We know you work hard and wish you had more time to focus on yourself because the way you present yourself to the world is important. We make one decision in your day a little easier. Whether rushing to work, trying to get to yoga class, or spending a much needed evening out with the girls, we've got your back! Each Dote Jewelry necklace comes with a 16" to 18" adjustable chain, so you can customize how YOU want to wear it. Show the world who YOU are with a pendant that is personal, elegant, and distinctly you. Go ahead. Dote on yourself. You've earned it.

All Dote Jewelry is made from the good stuff: solid .925 sterling silver that's actually genuine and never plated. In other words, we don't mess around. As you well know, pure sterling silver WILL tarnish over time and with exposure to "the elements". Because you've got better things to do than worry about jewelry upkeep, we include a silver polishing cloth with every purchase. When you spot a little dulling, simply rub your necklace with the cloth and it'll shine right up! We've got your back (and neck).
